markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=5102) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=5101)

</column>

---

You gain one witch feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your witch level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** l You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another witch feat.
name: Advanced Witchcraft
